definition.name: NXdetector_module
definition.doc: This is the description of a detector module. Many detectors consist of multiple smaller modules. Sometimes it is important to know the exact position of such modules. This is the purpose of this group. It is a child group to NXdetector.

field.name: data_origin
field.doc: A two value field which gives the index of the start of the modules data in the main area detector image in the underlying NXdetector module.

field.name: data_size
field.doc: Two values for the size of the module in pixels in each direction.

field.name: module_offset
field.doc: Offset of the module in regards to the origin of the detector in an arbitrary direction.

attribute.name: vector
attribute.doc: Three values that define the axis for this transformation

attribute.name: offset
attribute.doc: A fixed offset applied before the transformation

attribute.name: offset_units
attribute.doc: Units of the offset.

attribute.name: depends_on
attribute.doc: Points to the path of the next element in the geometry chain.
